home.title: ArenaOne
home.welcomeMessage: This is an example card component using rsp- prefixed classes for structure and styling.
home.exampleModalContent: This is an example modal dialog. Press Escape or click outside to close.
home.heroSubheadline: Discover and book courts at the best padel clubs near you
home.feature1Desc: Book courts in seconds with our simple and intuitive booking system.
home.feature2Desc: Access the best padel clubs with quality courts and facilities.
home.feature3Desc: Connect with professional coaches to improve your game.

personalized.title: Your Personalized Section
personalized.quickBookingDescription: Book your next padel session in just a few clicks.
personalized.selectClubStep: Select a club to get started
personalized.selectClubHint: Select the club where you want to play

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Search for padel clubs near you using our intuitive search and filtering system.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose your preferred time slot and book instantly with real-time availability.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Enjoy your game and track your training progress with professional coaches.

clubsCoaches.title: Featured Clubs & Coaches
clubsCoaches.club1Desc: Premium indoor courts with professional lighting and climate control.
clubsCoaches.club2Desc: Beautiful outdoor courts with stunning views and top facilities.
clubsCoaches.club3Desc: Modern urban facility with flexible booking and expert coaching.
clubsCoaches.coach1Desc: Former professional player with 10+ years of coaching experience.
clubsCoaches.coach2Desc: Certified coach specializing in beginners and intermediate players.
clubsCoaches.coach3Desc: Technical expert focused on advanced strategy and match preparation.

testimonials.title: What Our Players Say
testimonials.testimonial1Text: Amazing platform! I found my favorite club and improved my game significantly with their coaching program.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: The booking system is so easy to use. I can book courts anytime, anywhere. Highly recommend!
testimonials.testimonial3Text: Great variety of clubs and coaches. The quality of service has exceeded my expectations.
testimonials.testimonial4Text: Finally, a platform that makes finding and booking padel courts hassle-free. Love it!

sections.organizationDescription: These payment accounts are used as a fallback for clubs that don't have their own payment account configured.
sections.clubDescription: Club-level accounts have priority and override organization-level accounts for their respective clubs.

form.isActiveHint: Only active accounts are used for processing payments
form.merchantIdPlaceholderEdit: Enter new merchant ID to update
form.merchantLoginPlaceholderEdit: Enter new merchant login to update
form.secretKeyPlaceholderEdit: Enter new secret key to update
form.merchantSecretKeyPlaceholderEdit: Enter new merchant secret key to update
form.merchantPasswordPlaceholderEdit: Enter new merchant password to update
form.providerCannotChange: Provider cannot be changed after creation
form.credentialsEditHint: Leave blank to keep current credentials. Enter new values to update.
form.hintClub: This payment account will be used for all bookings in this club. Club-level accounts have priority over organization-level accounts.
form.hintOrganization: This payment account will be used as a fallback for clubs that don't have their own payment account configured.

status.title: Active Payment Configuration
status.fallbackHint: This club is using the organization-level payment account. Add a club-level account to override this.
status.notConfigured: No payment account configured for this club

verificationLevel.helpText: Real payment verification required. Verification will perform a minimal test payment (1 UAH). Funds go directly to your account.

priorityInfo.title: Payment Account Priority
priorityInfo.clubPriority: Club-level payment accounts have priority. If no club-level account is active, the organization-level account will be used as a fallback.
priorityInfo.organizationFallback: Organization-level payment accounts are used as a fallback for clubs that don't have their own payment account configured.

disableModal.title: Disable Payment Account
disableModal.message: Are you sure you want to disable this payment account? It will no longer be used for processing payments.

messages.verificationInitiated: Payment verification initiated. Redirecting to payment page...

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.publishClubDescription: Make this club visible to the public. Players will be able to view and book courts.
dangerZone.unpublishClubDescription: Hide this club from public view. Players will not be able to see or book courts. This action is reversible.
dangerZone.deleteClubDescription: Permanently delete this club and all associated data (courts, bookings, gallery images). This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.publishClubConfirm: Are you sure you want to publish "{name}"? It will become visible to all players.
dangerZone.unpublishClubConfirm: Are you sure you want to unpublish "{name}"? It will be hidden from public view.
dangerZone.publishOrgDescription: Make this organization visible to the public. Clubs under this organization can be accessed by players.
dangerZone.unpublishOrgDescription: Hide this organization from public view. Players will not be able to access clubs under this organization. This action is reversible.
dangerZone.publishOrgConfirm: Are you sure you want to publish "{name}"? It will become visible to all players.
dangerZone.unpublishOrgConfirm: Are you sure you want to unpublish "{name}"? It will be hidden from public view.
